articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Hydro-meteorological Service
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Hydro-meteorological Service
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Hydro-meteorological Service.
					 He went round various places including rooms for comprehensive weather forecast, domestic communication and international satellite communication to learn in detail about meteorological observation and weather forecast.
					
					 He said that there are many incorrect forecasts as the meteorological observation has not been put on a modern and scientific basis, adding that only when meteorological observation and forecast are done properly, is it possible to protect the lives and properties of the people from disasters caused by the abnormal climatic phenomenon and prevent various fields of national economy including agriculture and fishery from natural disasters in good time.
					
					 "It is necessary to fundamentally improve the work of the Hydro-meteorological Service in order to scientifically clarify meteorological and climatic conditions and provide accurate data for weather forecast and meteorological and climatic information required by various fields of national economy in good time", he noted.
					
					 He underscored the need to raise the responsibility of researchers and forecast persons and firmly build scientific and technical forces as hydro-meteorological service is a very important work directly affecting the overall economic affairs of the country.
					
					 He stressed the need to intensify the scientific researches to ensure the accuracy of short-, intermediary- and long-term forecast and conduct brisk scientific and technological exchanges with various countries of the world.
					
					 He called on the service to rapidly and kindly provide information about weather's influence upon the people's life, health, transport, etc. in diverse methods.
					
					 Underlining the need to properly distribute various kinds of observation networks as required by the natural and geographical features of the country and the developing reality and modernize meteorological observation equipment at a high level, he took measures for doing so with deep loving care.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, Han Kwang Sang and Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					 He looked round the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the farm.
					
					 He said that the farm turned into a vegetable production base for the citizens of the capital city under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He praised the officials and farmers of the farm for mass-producing vegetables of various species through their devoted service, bearing deep in mind the high pride of working at the honorable worksites.
					
					 He went round the newly built and remodeled vegetable green houses to acquaint himself with the vegetable production.
					
					 "It is gratifying that the co-op farm not only built dozens of new large modern vegetable green houses with big production capacity but successfully remodeled the existing green houses true to the intention of the Party Central Committee," he noted.
					
					 He learned in detail about the vegetable farming,  asking its officials what species of vegetables are being cultivated, how did they establish ventilation and irrigation systems and what system they set up for providing green house vegetable seeds.
					
					 "The party calls for building vegetable green houses in a big way and promoting it with an aim to enable our people to eat fresh vegetables including cucumber, tomato, crown daisy and lettuce everyday even in midwinter", he said.
					
					 Noting that it is hard to substantially benefit from vegetable green houses if measures are not taken simultaneously to develop the cultivation technology and provide vegetable seeds even if these green houses are built with much effort, he called for making sustained energetic efforts to raise the productivity by putting the greenhouse vegetable cultivation on a scientific and intensive basis at a high level.
					
					 "Only when a model is created and generalized in the greenhouse vegetable production, too, is it possible to expand the successes made in it", he noted, adding that it is the resolution of the Party Central Committee to build the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm into a typical unit in the greenhouse vegetable production and a model farm for the whole country.
					
					 He instructed the farm to decisively raise the per-hectare yield by perfecting the scientific greenhouse vegetable cultivation method and bring about a radical turn in the living environment and appearance of the farm as required by the new century.
					
					 He stressed the need to dynamically push forward the greenhouse construction and management as a party work in order to promote the construction of vegetable greenhouses for supplying the people with fresh vegetables.
					
					 He said he would receive again from the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK a detailed report on the issues arising in building the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm into a model farm for the whole country and promised to take a measure to ensure that those issues are settled preferentially.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Portugal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Portugal
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Anibal Cavaco Silva, president of Portugal, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished Portugal steady development and prosperity.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Aborting Joint National Event Marking June 15
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Aborting Joint National Event Marking June 15
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement Tuesday as regards the fact that the reunification event for celebrating June 15 and the memorial service to be jointly held by compatriots from the north, south and abroad have become abortive due to the obstructive moves of the south Korean puppet regime although they have been pushed forward amid great expectation and concern of the public at home and abroad.
					 The North Side Committee called on compatriots in the south and abroad to hold with splendor a joint national event for reunification in Kaesong with representatives from various circles in the north, south and abroad involved on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the statement recalled, adding:
					
					 The committee also proposed holding a joint memorial service to honor the victims of the ferry sinking disaster in south Korea.
					
					 Those just proposals made by the DPRK were fully supported and welcomed by the South Side Committee and the Overseas Side Committee and other organizations and personages of various circles in south Korea and abroad.
					
					 Nevertheless, only the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea deterred the South Side Committee from participating in the working contact scheduled to be held in Kaesong as regards the joint reunification event, unreasonably oft-repeating the assertion that those events would stir up "conflict in the south" and "it is not appropriate under the present situation of the north-south relations" and the like.
					
					 This is nothing but a blatant challenge to the north-south joint declaration and a tyrannical action against reunification and nation.
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration serves as a foundation of reconciliation and unity of the nation, a starting point for mending the north-south relations and a great joint programme of the nation for reunification the validity and vitality of which have already been proved in practice.
					
					 However, the Park group has been keen on escalating the confrontation with the DPRK in wanton violation of the north-south joint declarations, letting loose such anti-reunification sophism as "great opportunity for unification", "Dresden initiative" and the like.
					
					 It is none other than the puppet group which has blocked the NGOs of the north and the south from having contacts and joint meetings for implementing the north-south declarations and even cut off their communication. 
					
					 It is the sinister design of the Park group to obliterate the north-south joint declarations, completely block the reunification movement and cooperation of NGOs, push the north-south relations to a catastrophe and thus realize its wild ambition for the confrontation of the social systems in the north and the south.
					
					 The more desperately the south Korean puppet group works to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north while violating the north-south declarations and suppressing the activities of people of various circles in south Korea for reunification, the stronger resistance of all compatriots it will encounter and the further it will precipitate its miserable ruin.
					
					 The statement called on all compatriots at home and abroad to intensify the struggle for implementing the north-south declarations and thus frustrate the puppet group's vicious moves to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north and open up a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: State Commendations Awarded to Those Performed Labor Feats in Remodeling Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
articles.content:
State Commendations Awarded to Those Performed Labor Feats in Remodeling Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- State recommendations were awarded to soldier-builders, designers, officials and other people who performed great labor feats in successfully finishing in the shortest time the project for remodeling the Songdowon International Children's Camp.
					 The title of the DPRK Labor Hero and gold medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag 1st Class were conferred on Ri Kwang Il, Jin Ki Song and Wi Yong Guk.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Prize was awarded to Pak Chang Sik, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize to Pak Jong Won, Kang Chol Ju and Ri Kwang Ho and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to Jang Jong Hun, Kim Jin Hyok, Choe Sok Chol and Kim Jong Chol.
					
					 The title of Designer of Merit went to three persons, the title of Technician of Merit to one person, the title of Builder of Merit to two persons, the title of Driver of Merit to two persons and the title of Artiste of Merit to one person.
					
					 Order of National Flag 1st Class were conferred on 25 persons, Order of Labor on 31 persons, Order of National Flag 2nd Class on 308 persons, Order of National Flag 3rd Class on 804 persons, Distinguished Military Service Medal on 1,536 persons and Medal of Merit on 116 persons.
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on Monday.

articles.title: Friendship Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
Friendship Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation led by Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association, Tuesday returned home after visiting Laos.

articles.title: AFC Coaching Course in DPRK
articles.content:
AFC Coaching Course in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The AFC (Asian Football Confederation) "B" license award coaching course goes on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea from May 28 to June 15.
					 Attending the course, divided into theoretical and practical sections, are football coaches of sports teams who won a "C" license award as well as instructors from juvenile sports schools.
					
					 In the theoretic aspect it deals with the principles of training and coaching, coach's role and guidance ability, playing tactics, morals and rules, footballers' physical ability and condition, etc.
					
					 In practice it focuses on the pass, mid- and long-distance pass, pressing defense, goal keeper field and warming-up exercises, defense against side attack, collective defense and so on.
					
					 Ardeshir Pournemat, an AFC instructor and coach from Iran, officiates at the course.

articles.title: Service Personnel Tour Area of Taehongdan
articles.content:
Service Personnel Tour Area of Taehongdan
 Taehongdan, June 10 (KCNA) -- The group of service personnel of the Korean People's Army for the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu toured the area of Taehongdan.
					 The group left Samjiyon on June 8 and marched along the Kapsan-Musan guard road, recalling the superb strategy and matchless pluck of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The members of the group looked round a monument to the poem dedicated to the revolutionary history of leader Kim Jong Il who forced his way through the snowdrifts in the van in February Juche 88 (1999). The monument stands at the fork to Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They held a question-and-answer contest while marching the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did. At Mubong Senior Secondary School in Samjiyon County, they handed over school things, sports apparatuses, etc. to it.
					
					 They toured the revolutionary battle site in Taehongdan on June 9.
					
					 They put a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battles in Musan Area and paid tribute to him. Then they went round the tower of a rifle, a large group of sculptures of subsidiary theme, etc.
					
					 Before the monument they had a meeting to explain the greatness of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The speakers praised the brilliant military insight and the outstanding commanding art with which Kim Il Sung led to victory the operation for advancing into the area of Musan and the spirit of devotedly defending the leader displayed by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and her ardent patriotism.
					
					 The group also toured the revolutionary battle site in Sinsadong.
					
					 On June 10, the members of the group met with discharged soldiers active on the Hongam Farm in Taehongdan County.
					
					 They exchanged greetings with ex-soldiers and their wives and other agricultural workers who are bringing about a signal boost in the potato production in the Paektu plateau in the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					 They played sports games with ex-soldiers in Taehongdan and helped them in their work.
					
					 They are accelerating their march towards Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Commemorate Anniversary of Victory in Battles in Musan Area
articles.content:
School Youth and Children Commemorate Anniversary of Victory in Battles in Musan Area
 Taehongdan, June 10 (KCNA) -- School youth and children Tuesday held a meeting in front of the Monument to the Victorious Battles in Musan Area on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the victory in the battles in Musan area. They vowed to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun started in Mt. Paektu, under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					 The participants in the meeting laid a floral basket and flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the monument and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 Led by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the youth league Central Committee, they vowed to remain faithful to the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting they looked round the statue of Kim Il Sung, a relievo depicting anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and other relievos dealing with the indomitable struggle of anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners, a large group of sculptures of subsidiary themes depicting the struggle of the explorers of the plateau and representing the present happy life of the people in Taehongdan, the tower of a rifle and a monument to the revolutionary history.

articles.title: Rice-transplanting Ends in DPRK
articles.content:
Rice-transplanting Ends in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Rice-transplanting has been mainly finished across the country. 
					 Agricultural workers of the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City, the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province, the Unhung Co-op Farm in Thaechon County, North Phyongan Province, the Samjigang Co-op Farm in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province, the Sinam Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County, North Phyongan Province and the Mangyongdae Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang City took the lead in rice-transplanting. 
					
					 Farms in Pyongyang, North Phyongan and Jagang provinces mainly finished rice-transplanting till late May. 
					
					 Officials of Mangyongdae District, Sunan District, Sinuiju City and Kwaksan and Pakchon counties went to the farms and strengthened technical guidance to correctly ensure the number of plants per phyong and the number per plant. 
					
					 Agricultural workers and helpers transplanted strong rice seedlings every day from the beginning of rice-transplanting. 
					
					 South and North Hwanghae provinces mobilized all machines and manpower to push forward rice-transplanting qualitatively. 
					
					 Co-op farms in the east coastal and tableland areas reasonably distributed manpower and conducted socialist emulations of work teams and sub-work teams, registering successes in rice-transplanting. 
					
					 North Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces fulfilled their daily quotas for rice-transplanting. 
					
					 Agricultural workers and helpers across the country are now directing bigger efforts to manuring and cultivating crops.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Help Hwasong Vegetable Greenhouse Farm
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Help Hwasong Vegetable Greenhouse Farm
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials did friendship labor at the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Hwasong Vegetable Greenhouse Farm on Tuesday. 
					 They gave helping hands to farmers in weeding vegetable fields. 
					
					 At a break they had a talk with officials of the farm. 
					
					 The Cuban ambassador expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries will grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK's Advanced Disinfecting Water Equipment Gains Popularity
articles.content:
DPRK's Advanced Disinfecting Water Equipment Gains Popularity
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A new kind of advanced disinfecting water equipment, developed by the State Nano-technology Bureau in the DPRK, has gained popularity at home and abroad.
					 The equipment has already been introduced to depositing reservoirs, swimming pools and baths, including the Changgwang Health Complex and the Munsu Water Park, as well as foodstuff factories in the country.
					
					 It makes antiseptic solution mixed with ozone, activated chlorine, hydrogen peroxide and sodium hypochlorite by electrolyzing water with 0.3-0.5 percent of salt.
					
					 A liter of the solution can sterilize 800 to 1,000 liters of water. This solution is tens of times stronger than liquid chlorine and bleaching powder in sterilizing power, and it is efficacious for skin diseases, eczema, women's diseases and burns.
					
					 The solution reaches water quality indexes recommended by the World Health Organization.
					
					 The disinfecting water equipment of different sizes has been exported to foreign countries, including Mongolia, Syria, Uganda and Peru.

articles.title: Schoolchildren Enjoy Camping Season in DPRK
articles.content:
Schoolchildren Enjoy Camping Season in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Many schoolchildren of the DPRK are now enjoying themselves at the Songdowon International Children's Camp, remodeled under the warm care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, and other camps across the country. 
					 In this regard, KCNA had interviews with some campers and staff at different children's camps. 
					
					 Kim Ki Bo, director of the Mangyongdae Children's Camp, said:
					
					 At present, hundreds of schoolchildren lead a camping life here, training their body and mind.
					
					 Most of them like to go boating and collecting plants.
					
					 On June 6, the birthday of the Korean Children's Union, the campers climbed the peak of Tae Hill according to the schedule, during which they set up tents and cooked by themselves.
					
					 They are recording their pleasant camping days on photos and diaries.
					
					 Ri Jong Im, a student of Ponghwa Junior Secondary School in Pothonggang District of Pyongyang, said at the Sokam Children's Camp:
					
					 I came first both in mountaineering and cooking.
					
					 The dishes I cooked were not much delicious than those my mum would do, but I relished them with my friends.
					
					 Camping here is so enjoyable that I want to stay here longer.
					
					 O Song Chol, a swimming instructor of the Songdowon International Children's Camp, said:
					
					 The campers are very fond of learning swimming at this splendidly-built gymnasium.
					
					 Whenever seeing their happy looks, I feel deep gratitude to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for having turned the camp into a luxurious palace for the children.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Theory of THAAD Hypocritical
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Theory of THAAD Hypocritical 
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- It was reported that recently the issue of adopting the U.S.-sponsored memorandum of understanding for military information sharing among the U.S., Japan and south Korea was officially agreed upon. The U.S. claimed the MoU would be "limited to information about nuclear and missiles of north Korea".
					 This is another sophism mocking at the international community including the regional countries. 
					
					 The tripartite military information sharing pushed forward by the U.S. is part of the prearranged operation to hasten the establishment of the missile defense system in the Asia-Pacific region under the pretext of "threats" from the DPRK. 
					
					 As known already, the U.S. has pushed forward in real earnest the establishment of the MD, a core project for implementing its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The tripartite information sharing is aimed at rounding off the MD in the long-run. 
					
					 The assertion that the "MoU will be limited to information about nuclear and missiles of north Korea" is intended to play down the south Korea-Japan friction, a hurdle lying in the way of building the missile shield, in a bid to make its stooges readily accept it. 
					
					 One of its important objectives is to calm down the opposition of the regional countries. 
					
					 However, no country would be taken in by the "U.S. fiction about nuclear and missile threats from north Korea". 
					
					 The operational sphere of various type latest monitoring or intercepting means which  the U.S. has deployed in south Korea and Japan and is mulling selling to them under the pretext of coping with the "threats" from the DPRK has already gone beyond the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Supposing that THAAD which the south Korean puppet forces are going to secretly introduce from the U.S. was developed to destroy flying objects in outer space, Global Hawk the plan for whose introduction was announced by it has an operation radius of thousands of kilometers. 
					
					 This clearly indicates that the targets of THAAD are none other than big powers in the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The U.S. criminal moves to establish the MD will touch off greater caution and opposition of the regional countries.

articles.title: Papers Mark Anniversary of June Popular Resistance
articles.content:
Papers Mark Anniversary of June Popular Resistance
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The June popular resistance was the righteous all-people resistance recorded in the history of south Koreans' struggle against the U.S. and fascism, say papers Tuesday.  
					 Traitor Chun Doo Hwan designated Roh Tae Woo as a "presidential" candidate on June 10, 1987. This kicked off a massive resistance that swept across south Korea all at once.
					
					 Much upset by this, traitor Chun desperately kicked up the discriminate crackdown racket with lots of riot police involved, but in face of the strong spirit of unity and resistance displayed by the people, he could not but publish a "special declaration" to accept the demand of the people.
					
					 The June Popular Resistance was an eruption of the pent-up resentment of the people against the Chun group which resorted to the unprecedented acts of sycophantic treachery, fascist crackdown and anti-reunification moves and against the U.S. imperialists who sought to turn south Korea into their permanent colony by instigating the Chun group, says the papers.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in an article notes that the staunch fighting spirit and precious soul of the fighters of the June Popular Resistance call upon the south Korean people to wage a massive struggle for independence and democracy against the U.S. and fascism and for national reunification.
					
					 Independence, democracy and reunification can be achieved only through massive and staunch struggle against dictators who stand against them, the article notes.
					
					 Minju Joson in an article says that it is an urgent task of the era for the south Korean people to turn out in the massive resistance for independence, democracy and national reunification against the U.S. and fascism by inheriting the spirit displayed by the resistance fighters.

articles.title: S. Korea's Dispatch of Army Unit to U.S. for Anti-DPRK War Exercises Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Dispatch of Army Unit to U.S. for Anti-DPRK War Exercises Assailed
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group sent so-called an elite unit of the puppet army made up of the motorized infantry unit, chemical, biological and radioactive unit and special warfare unit to the U.S.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says by dispatching the puppet army unit to the U.S. for the DPRK-targeted war exercises, Park fully revealed her true colors as a warmonger far surpassing the successive ruling forces.
					
					 Irony is that the unit is going to take part in the combined exercises allegedly to "eliminate" the DPRK's nuclear weapons in case of "contingency", the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Park group, utterly unaware of the reality in the DPRK, thinks a sort of "contingency" will occur in it. It is, indeed, a group of maniacs obsessed with confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 In fact, the contingency is taking place in south Korea as proven by the anti-"government" struggle being waged by people from all walks of life almost every day demanding the resignation of Park Geun Hye after the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					
					 Much upset by the daily worsening ruling crisis, Park Geun Hye is finding a way-out in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 If the Park group rushes headlong into provoking a war against the DPRK, its army and people will clearly show the group what a real war is like.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lays Bare Gravity of U.S. "Weather Weapon Plan"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lays Bare Gravity of U.S. "Weather Weapon Plan"
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Ria-Novosti of Russia reported that the U.S. air force at a recent hearing of the Senate informed that it would stop the plan for high-frequency active aurora research. It is the research plan started by the U.S. in top secrecy from 1990 by allocating 290 million U.S. dollars to its air force, navy, Alaska University, etc. for the purpose of modifying climate change.
					 What matters is that the plan was basic factors of the Philippine landslide in 2006, the flood damage in Pakistan in 2010, the great earthquake damage in East Japan in 2011 and all-time heat damage in Moscow in 2010 all of which brought so huge disasters to mankind.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this proves that the U.S. has pushed forward the "plan for weather weapon" under the plea of scientific research.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has gone frantic with the moves to carry out the plan by squandering a fabulous amount of funds in order to realize its ambition for world domination, not for human civilization and development.
					
					 The U.S. is talking a lot about "human rights" and "peace" but can never conceal its true colors as a top-class war criminal that has done all evil things to attain its criminal aim to "dominate the world." 
					
					 What remains to be done by the U.S. is to open to public its unethical crimes and face mankind's fair judgment.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Teachers Union under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Teachers Union under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Leading members of the Teachers Union of south Korea (TU) staged a hunger strike in Seoul on June 9 in protest against the puppet authorities' crackdown upon it, according to south Korean KBS.
					 As already reported, the Park Geun Hye regime has persecuted the TU, regarding its activities as a thorn in its flesh. It kicked up a fresh racket of suppression, taking issue with its internal rules last year.
					
					 The regime pressurized the TU to modify its rules which recognize the discharged persons as its members.
					
					 It threatened to disqualify the TU as a trade union in case it fails to do so.
					
					 The puppet group finally sent a notice to the TU on October 24 in which it declared the TU outside the law and has since worked hard to legislate on this.
					
					 In protest against this, the TU filed a lawsuit with a court demanding the retraction of the above-said action.  The leading members of the TU launched a hunger sit-in in the run-up to the first trial slated to take place on June 19.
					
					 The strikers declared that the regime's action was obviously part of the repressive campaign against the TU.
					
					 They urged the "government" to rescind the unreasonable action at once before the court makes a decision.

articles.title: South Koreans Call for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
South Koreans Call for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The North Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration sponsored a meeting in Jonju, North Jolla Province in south Korea on June 8 to commemorate the 14th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Attending the meeting were at least 3 000 people from all walks of life.
					
					 The full text of the north-south joint declaration was read out.
					
					 Speakers recollected the epoch-making events in the development of the inter-Korean relations and the reunification movement in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 They accused the present regime of south Korea of disregarding all Koreans' desire to put an end to the national division and reunify the country.
					
					 They called for implementing the June 15 joint declaration to achieve peace and reunification.
					
					 Then started a marathon for Korea's reunification marking the 14th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The participants ran the course extending 6.15 km. 
					
					 That day they launched a signature campaign in demand of the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and institution of a special law.

articles.title: Replacement of Chongwadae Publicity Chief by Park Geun Hye Censured
articles.content:
Replacement of Chongwadae Publicity Chief by Park Geun Hye Censured
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People Monday carried an editorial disclosing the true intention sought by Park Geun Hye by replacing the publicity chief of Chongwadae with a new man.
					 The editorial said Park replaced the chief under the pressure of the public but she appointed a pro-"government" person to the post.
					
					 The new chief is a guy who was censured for kowtowing to power since the Lee Myung Bak regime and causing a furor for censoring anti-"government" articles right after Park took office, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 Chongwadae is calling for cabinet reshuffle, but there is nothing to expect from Park's personnel policy.
					
					 No matter how frequently Park may change her confidants, nothing will change unless she changes her ruling mode.
					
					 The appointment of another confidant in the wake of the appointment of Kim Kwan Jin and Han Min Gu signifies that there will be no change in her future state administration.
					
					 The editorial inquired Park until when she is going to keep the state of misunderstanding and self-complacence though the public mindset against her was confirmed through the recent elections.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The Mexican national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 4.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the brilliant revolutionary career of the President and his immortal exploits through media and hold political and cultural events including remembrance meeting, lecture and seminar on his exploits in the period between June 8 and July 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Russian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Russian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia formed a committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung.
					 The committee decided to hold events including seminar and lecture to praise the greatness of the President and his immortal exploits.
					
					 A statement on it was released on June 3. 
					
					 The statement expressed support for the appeal of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea to hold an internet seminar on the great career and undying feats of the President.

articles.title: British Political Parties and Organizations Hold Joint Seminar
articles.content:
British Political Parties and Organizations Hold Joint Seminar
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar of British political parties and organizations took place in London on May 31 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 On display at the venue of the seminar were works of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there were personages of British political parties and organizations and masses.
					
					 The representative of the Britain-Korea Friendship Association made a speech titled "Immortal party building exploits performed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and proclaimed the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as supreme programme of the party, the speaker said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il established the Songun politics as the basic political mode and developed the WPK into a militant general staff of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The immortal party building exploits performed by Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by the progressive mankind of the world.
					
					 The representative of the New Communist Party of Britain made a speech titled "Historic significance of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration".
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration holds a distinguished place in carrying out the cause of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself set forth in the declaration serves as a principle to be taken as guidelines in implementing the cause of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The reality clearly proves the validity of the idea of By Our Nation Itself, its great vitality, scientific accuracy and truth.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly hope for detente on the Korean peninsula and improvement of the relations between the north and the south, they should respect the June 15 joint declaration and take practical measures to implement it.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Newspaper Supports Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Newspaper Supports Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi newspaper The Daily Folk carried an article titled "Reunification June 15" on June 1 on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The paper said:
					
					 The publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration made it possible for the north and the south of Korea to aspire after reconciliation, unity and reunification based on the commonality that they are one and the same nation despite the differing ideology and social systems and confrontation, mistrust, jealousy and antagonism that persisted between them.
					
					 After the adoption of the declaration, dialogues and working-level contacts took place in various fields between the north and the south.
					
					 Joint agreements were reached from the stand of prioritizing the desire and interests of the fellow countrymen, thus promoting the national unity, cooperation and exchanges and bringing about reunification-oriented fruitions.
					
					 But the present south Korean conservative authorities have totally denied the June 15 joint declaration from the first days of office, hamstrung the efforts for implementing cooperation projects between the north and the south, a valuable fruit brought about by the June 15 era of reunification, and bred plots against the north one after another. This led to a confrontational phase.
					
					 To affirm June 15 is to stand for reunification and to deny it is to stand for division and war. It is truth acknowledged by not only the Korean nation but the rest of the world.
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a reunified thriving nation singing loudly the song "Reunification June 15".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in France
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in France

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ethiopia

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon del capitalino municipio de Sadong.
					El estuvo primero en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Recordo que la granja se ha convertido en una base especializada en la produccion de vegetales para los capitalinos bajo la sabia orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Evaluo el hecho de que los funcionarios y los campesinos de la granja cultivan muchas verduras de diferentes variedades trabajando con abnegacion sintiendose orgullosos de su centro de trabajo glorioso.
					
					Pasando revista a los invernaderos nuevamente construidos y remodelados, el Mariscal averiguo el estado de produccion.
					
					Es bueno que en acato al proposito del Comite Central del PTC, la granja haya construido decenas de nuevos invernaderos modernos con gran capacidad productiva y remodelado magnificamente los otros ya existentes, expreso.
					
					Se cercioro del estado de cultivo de vegetales preguntando cuales son las variedades que se cultivan ahora, como se ha establecido el sistema de ventilacion e irrigacion y como funciona el sistema de suministro de semillas de verduras de invernadero.
					
					Apunto que el partido promueve la construccion masiva de invernaderos para alimentar al pueblo el pepino, el tomate, Chrysanthemum coronarium, la lechuga y otros vegetales frescos tambien en la plena estacion invernal.
					
					Aunque hayamos construido los invernaderos con muchos trabajos, es muy dificil beneficiarnos realmente de ellos si no desarrollamos la tecnologia de cultivo ni tomamos las medidas de suministro de semillas, instruyo. Resalto la necesidad de seguir trabajando con teson para aumentar la productividad al realizar en nivel alto el cultivo cientifico e intensivo de hortalizas. 
					
					Recalco que sera posible ampliar el exito una vez creado y generalizado el modelo tambien en la produccion de verduras bajo vidrio. Prosiguio que el CC del PTC esta decidido a acondicionar la granja en la unidad modelo de la produccion de hortalizas bajo vidrio y la granja ejemplar del pais.
					
					Instruyo a la granja aumentar decisivamente el rendimiento por hectarea al perfeccionar el cientifico metodo de cultivo de verduras bajo vidrio y renovar el ambiente de vida y la fisonomia de la granja a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					
					Para suministrar las verduras frescas al pueblo al fomentar el cultivo en invernaculo, hay que impulsar como labor del partido la construccion y la operacion de los invernaderos, indico.
					
					Diciendo que se informaria otra vez de los problemas surgidos en acondicionar la granja como la ejemplar del pais mediante el informe detallado del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, prometio tomar las medidas para solucionarlos con preferencia.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica.
					En su recorrido por varios puntos, inclusive la sala de pronostico general, la de comunicacion nacional y la de comunicacion internacional via satelite, averiguo en detalles el estado de observacion y pronostico del tiempo.
					
					Ahora hay muchos pronosticos equivocados debido a la falta de modernizacion y cientifizacion en la observacion meteorologica, senalo.
					
					 Prosiguio que cuando marchen bien la observacion y el pronostico del tiempo, sera posible proteger la vida y los bienes del pueblo desde los desastres a causa de fenomenos climaticos anormales y evitar a tiempo los danos naturales en varios sectores de la economia nacional, inclusive la agricultura y la pesqueria.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de mejorar radicalmente la gestion de la Direccion para aclarar de modo cientifico las condiciones meteorologico-climaticas y ofrecer a tiempo y correcto los datos necesarios al pronostico del tiempo y los otros meteorologico-climaticos que se necesitan en diversas esferas de la economia nacional.
					
					Los investigadores y los pronosticadores deben elevar su responsabilidad y al mismo tiempo, hay que preparar un colectivo de cientificos y tecnicos competentes porque la meteorologia e hidrologia son trabajos muy importantes que influyen directamente en las gestiones economicas generales del pais, puntualizo.
					
					Anadio que se debe profundizar la investigacion cientifica para garantizar la exactitud del pronostico del tiempo a plazos corto, intermedio y largo y dinamizar el intercambio cientifico-tecnico con otros paises del mundo.
					
					Instruyo mejorar de diferentes maneras la informacion rapida y amable de las influencias del tiempo sobre la vida y la salud de las personas, el trafico y el transporte, etc.
					
					Tomo las medidas para distribuir bien las redes de observacion de diferentes tipos acorde a las caracteristicas naturales y geograficas del pais y a las demandas de la realidad en desarrollo y para modernizar en alto nivel los equipos de la rama.
					
					En esta visita el fue acompanado por Hwang Pyong So, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, Han Kwang Sang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Comite norteno por Ejecucion de Declaracion Conjunta denuncia maniobras de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Comite norteno por Ejecucion de Declaracion Conjunta denuncia maniobras de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que debido a las maniobras obstaculizadoras de la banda titere del Sur de Corea, no pueden ser realizados el acto comun nacional de la reunificacion del 15 de junio y el de recordacion conjunta que se promovian en medio de la gran esperanza y atencion de los connacionales y extranjeros, el portavoz del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publica el dia 10  una declaracion.
					  El Comite Norteno propuso a los comites sureno y ultramarino que con motivo del 14o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, los delegados de distintos estratos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar inauguren con solemnidad en Kaesong el acto conjunto nacional por la reunificacion, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Igualmente presento la propuesta de realizar el acto conjunto de recordacion del Norte, Sur y en ultramar en relacion con la tragedia de hundimiento del barco de pasajeros ocurrido en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Las entidades y las personalidades de distintos estratos del Sur y en ultramar incluyendo los comites sureno y ultramarino por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio apoyaron totalmente y dieron bienvenida a tales propuestas justas de la RPDC.
					
					  Pero, solo la horda de Park Geun-hye impidio la participacion del Comite Sureno en el contacto de expertos en Kaesong alusivo al acto comun de reunificacion disparateando absurdamente que esto "incitara el conflicto entre las personas surcoreanas y es inapropiado bajo las circunstancias actuales de relaciones Sur-Norte"
					
					  Esto deviene el desafio abierto a la Declaracion Conjunta del Norte y Sur y la brutalidad anti-reunificacion y antinacional.
					
					  La historica declaracion conjunta del 15 de Junio es la base de la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, el punto de partida para resolver el problema de las relaciones Norte-Sur y el gran programa comun de la nacion por la reunificacion, cuya justicia y vitalidad ya se comprobaron evidentemente.
					
					  Pero, la horda de Park Geun-hye pisoteo cruelmente las declaraciones conjuntas del Norte y el Sur y recurre con frenesi al enfrentamiento anti-RPDC abogando por la sofisteria conflictiva anti-reunificacion como "Thong-il Taebak" (cajon de  tesoros para la unificacion) y el "proyecto de Dresden".
					
					  Ademas impide el contacto y la reunion conjunta de las entidades civiles Norte-Sur por la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta  y hasta el lazo de comunicacion.
					
					  Eliminar las declaraciones conjuntas aprobadas entre el Norte y el Sur, bloquear totalmente el movimiento por la reunificacion y la cooperacion de las entidades civiles y realizar la ilusion de la confrontacion entre regimenes al llevar a la catastrofe las relaciones intercoreanas, son la intencion malsana de la banda de Park Geun-hye.
					
					  Cuanto mas viole dichas declaraciones, reprima las actividades de distintos estratos por la reunificacion y recurra a la confrontacion fratricida, tanto mas la horda titere del Sur de Corea tropezara con la resistencia fuerte de todos los coreanos y no evitara el destino tragico de autodestruccion.
					
					  Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben avivar mas el fervor por la ejecucion de la declaracion conjunta para frustrar las crueles maniobras fratricidas de la banda titere y abrir una nueva fase de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.

articles.title: Condecorados a contribuyentes a reconstruccion de campamento internacional de la infancia
articles.content:
Condecorados a contribuyentes a reconstruccion de campamento internacional de la infancia
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hubo la condecoracion estatal a los militares, disenadores, funcionarios y trabajadores que realizaron meritos laborales en terminar pronto la obra de reconstruccion del Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon. 
					Ri Kwang Il, Jin Ki Song y Wi Yong Guk recibieron la Medalla de Oro "El Martillo y la Hoz" y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase con el titulo del Heroe del Trabajo. 
					
					Fue otorgado el Premio Kim Il Sung a Pak Chang Sik; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung a Pak Jong Won, Kang Chol Ju y Ri Kwang Ho; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il a Jang Jong Hun, Kim Jin Hyok, Choe Sok Chol y Kim Jong Chol. 
					
					Fue concedido el titulo de Disenador Benemerito a 3 personas; el de Tecnico Benemerito y el de Artista Benemerito a una, respectivamente; y el de Constructor Benemerito y el de Chofer Benemerito a dos, respectivamente.
					
					Fue entregada la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a 25 personas, la Orden del Trabajo a 31, la Orden Bandera Nacional de segunda clase a 308, la misma orden de tercera clase a 804, la Medalla del Merito Militar a mil 536, y la Medalla del Merito Laboral a 116.
					
					Quedo publicado el dia 9 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.

articles.title: Se efectua cursillo para entrenadores de clase B de CAF
articles.content:
Se efectua cursillo para entrenadores de clase B de CAF
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- Tiene lugar en Corea el cursillo de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol (CAF) para entrenadores de clase B.
					Toman parte en la ocasion los entrenadores de todos los conjuntos deportivos que recibieron la calificacion C y maestros asignados de las escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					El cursillo se realiza dividido en la teoria y la practica.
					
					Segun la agenda programada, se llevan la leccion sobre la demanda del entrenamiento y la guia, el papel y la capacidad directiva de los entrenadores, la tactica del sistema de competencia, los principios morales y los reglamentos de juego, los elementos de composicion de la capacidad corporal, la salud de los futbolistas y otros.
					
					Los participantes aprenden el pase del balon y el adiestramiento de la capacidad de asistencia en la cancha de entrenamiento de futbol, el uso del pase de larga y mediana distancia, la defensa estrecha, la posicion y los ejercicios preparatorios del portero, la defensa en el ataque por el flanco y la defensa colectiva, etc.
					
					El irani Ardeshir Pournemat, lector y entrenador de la CAF, preside el cursillo.
